text: Anthony's restaurant is on highway 29 and pittschool rd.  There open about 3 months.  If you want the best cheesesteak u have to go there. good place with good people.

If i could give more than 5 stars I would. I was in the Concord area on business my client (P3 Services and I (Crossroads Printing) decided to grab something to eat - we decided to try Anthonys and got THE BEST Cheesesteaks I have had in a long time. The owner is so friendly and his guys are great - we had a blast there! Thank you to all those guys and we will be back over and over and over again!
This place no longer exists! And for good reason... Horrible Food, Horrible Service. Glad the closed!
